Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>……おまえはおしゃべりだな。 よく話が尽きないもんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>... You're quite the chatterbox. You never seem to stop talking...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>も<Eugene>もしゃべらないから、 ボクががんばって盛り上げてるんじゃないかー！
Entry.EnglishText: Well that's because you two hardly say anything! I'm trying my hardest to liven things up!

Entry.JapaneseText: 二人がしゃべってくれれば、 ボクだって少しは楽になるのにー。
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe if you two would talk to me, I wouldn't have to pick up the slack.

Entry.JapaneseText: 軍人はムダ口を叩くべきではない。
Entry.EnglishText: Soldiers have no time for idle prattle.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……しゃべっている暇などない……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't have time to chat...

Entry.JapaneseText: ナニそれ！ あーもう！ 暗くてヤダー！ 誰かおしゃべりできる相手を仲間にしたいヨ！
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, forget it! You guys are too serious! I want to make friends with someone who can hold a conversation!
